name: Karuma and the Falling Moon
description:
:

Karuma and the Falling Moon is a free to play RPG maker Vx Ace project by Mostdeep Team's child circle : Kamonabe Pasta. This game is a fantasy adventure RPG inspired by ATLUS's Shin Megami Tensei series.

Our Team : 

Kamonabe -Pasta : Story and Concept Art 

Mostdeep : Programming 

Kerochanto : Art Assistance

----------------------------+

INSTALLING :

Download the file, run the exe file, and install the exe in said folder, and unzip the data file into same directory of exe file, Don't forget to install the RTP and the Kozuka Mincho Font (the game will not display the text properly if you don't)

*You will need to install an RPG maker VX Ace RTP to play the game. Get it here 

*Do not install the exe. in the ZIP, or else any save state will disappear if you close the game!

----------------------------+

CURRENT VERSION :

0.5.0 ~ OPENING AND PROLOGUE (Very story oriented, much more features are still work in progress)

----------------------------+

OTHER LINKS :

Mostdeep Games - Web for Mostdeep Team (Which Kamonabe Pasta is a part of)
